import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Tab, Tabs, TabList, TabPanel } from 'react-tabs'; const data = [{ author:'Aklima', position:'COO', company:'AMERIMAR ENTERPRISES, INC.', content:'Aklima The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections Bonorum et Malorum original.', image:'/assets/images/client/testimonial-1.jpg' },{ author:'Paddy', position:'COO', company:'AMERIMAR ENTERPRISES, INC.', content:'Aklima The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections Bonorum et Malorum original.', image:'/assets/images/client/testimonial-2.jpg' },{ author:'Ruth', position:'COO', company:'AMERIMAR ENTERPRISES, INC.', content:'Aklima The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections Bonorum et Malorum original.', image:'/assets/images/client/testimonial-3.jpg' }] class Testimonial extends Component{ render(){ return(
{data.map((item,i)=>(

{item.content}

{item.author} - {item.position}, {item.company}
))} {data.map((item,i)=> (
))}
) } } export default Testimonial;
